Grilled Peaches with Rum, Almond, Vanilla
people
25g flaked almonds
20g butter
40g fine sugar
4 ripe peaches, halved if possible or cut in large chunks
50ml vanilla rum
Zest of 1/2 lemon
  1. Lightly toast the almonds in a pan over medium heat, and reserve for later
  2. Place the butter and half the sugar in the pan. When the sugar begins to melt, add the peaches skin-side down and cook until the bottoms begin to brown (about 5 minutes)
  3. Add the rum, and the remaining sugar and continue caramelizing for 1 more minute
  4. Turn the peaches over to brown the flesh sides (about 1 minute) and add in most of the almonds
  5. Finely grate over the lemon zest and stir into the caramel, then immediately serve and sprinkle the almonds over
Notes
  • Try adding all the sugar at the start
Serving Suggestions
  • With vanilla ice cream
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
